pkgmetadata.longdescription: Link Interactive Plots and Tables in 'shiny' Applications // Build powerful, linked-view dashboards in 'shiny' applications. With a declarative, one-line setup, you can create bidirectional links between interactive components. When a user interacts with one element (e.g., clicking a map marker), all linked components (such as 'DT' tables or other charts) instantly update. Supports 'leaflet' maps, 'DT' tables, 'plotly' charts, and spatial data via 'sf' objects out-of-the- box, with an extensible API for custom components.
